name: Ext_R4B_MedicationKnowledge_pa_type
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.MedicationKnowledge.packaging.type for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationKnowledge.packaging.type from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationKnowledge|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: A code that defines the specific type of packaging that the medication can be found in
element.definition: A code that defines the specific type of packaging that the medication can be found in (e.g. blister sleeve, tube, bottle).
element.comment: `MedicationKnowledge.packaging.type` has no related element in R5:MedicationKnowledge

element.short: A code that defines the specific type of packaging that the medication can be found in
element.definition: A code that defines the specific type of packaging that the medication can be found in (e.g. blister sleeve, tube, bottle).
element.comment: `MedicationKnowledge.packaging.type` has no related element in R5:MedicationKnowledge

binding.description: A coded concept defining the type of packaging of a medication.
